entry.title: swamp guppies (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that female swamp guppies (pictured) show no preference for orange or red coloration during courtship?

entry.title: suing him for copyright infringement (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Andrea Blanch said that she came to appreciate Jeff Koons's artwork more after suing him for copyright infringement?

entry.title: Desert Bus (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Desert Bus requires eight hours of continuous play to gain one point?

entry.title: Coco & Clair Clair (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Coco of Coco & Clair Clair developed her alias for school announcements during her senior year of high school?

entry.title: Transvaal Chinese Association (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the Transvaal Chinese Association opposed discriminatory legislation in the British Transvaal Colony alongside Mahatma Gandhi?

entry.title: a residential complex (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Turkish migrant workers living in a residential complex in Amsterdam refused to eat the Dutch food for two weeks after the kitchen's only Turkish chef was fired?

entry.title: an Australian High Court case (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that an Australian High Court case found a hotel chain to have used third-party contractors to avoid paying employees their required benefits?

entry.title: a tattoo on the anus (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that a tattoo on the anus of Brazilian singer Anitta ultimately led to inquiries to investigate the use of public funds in artists' concerts?
